sentences.en: A problem occurred when the wizard attempted to rename a registry key.
sentences.cn: 向导试图重命名注册表项时发生错误.

sentences.en: Describes how to specify values for registry keys on a target computer.
sentences.cn: 描述如何为目标计算机上的注册表项指定值.

sentences.en: For more information, see Registry Entries for Application - Level Add - Ins.
sentences.cn: 有关更多信息, 请参见应用程序级外接程序的注册表项.

sentences.en: I m pulse marriage at the Chelsea registry office.
sentences.cn: 我们冲动地在切尔西婚姻登记所结婚.

sentences.en: If you decide to install it, backup your Registry first.
sentences.cn: 如果您决定安装, 备份注册表一次.

sentences.en: Modify ( Full Access to All Files, Directories, and Registry )
sentences.cn: 修改 ( 对所有文件, 目录以及注册表的完全访问权限 )

sentences.en: Registry offices and churches have been booked up for months.
sentences.cn: 婚姻登记所和教堂在几个月前就已经被预订满了.

sentences.en: Registry will provide 30 days grace period for domain name renewal.
sentences.cn: 域名期满后,提供30天作为域名续约(费)宽限期.

sentences.en: Select one of the following backup copies of the registry to restore.
sentences.cn: 选择以下注册表的备份副本以将其还原.

sentences.en: The certificate will have to be lodged at the registry.
sentences.cn: 证书必须存放在登记处.

sentences.en: The land registry management in this village is very confusing.
sentences.cn: 这个村子的地籍管理得很混乱.

sentences.en: The map is kept at the local land registry.
sentences.cn: 地图存放在当地的土地登记处.

sentences.en: The public registry in Panama City keeps computerized records of all companies.
sentences.cn: 巴拿马城的公共注册处把所有公司的登记信息都存入了电脑。

sentences.en: The registry holds records of all major operations.
sentences.cn: 登记处有所有重大手术的记录.

sentences.en: They'd pulled the registry office down which then left an open space.
sentences.cn: 他们拆掉户籍登记处后，那里留下了一片空地。

words.tran_cn: 注册的；记名的；登记过的；（家畜等）附有血统证明的
登记；注册；记录；寄存器；登记簿
登记员；注册主任；专科住院医师
登记；注册；记录；挂号邮寄；把…挂号；正式提出
注册；登记处；挂号处；船舶的国籍

phrases.tran_cn: 登录机码；注册码；注册键

trans.tran_cn: 记录，登记，登记处，挂号处，记录簿，船舶的国籍
trans.tran_en: a place where information used by an organization is kept, especially official records or lists
